dcmhome.noCampaigns: No campaigns have been created yet:
dcmhome.campaignNotStarted: Once the campaign has started, the statistics about the campaign will be displayed here
dcmhome.noOffers:
Once the campaign is launched, some basic data on the progress of your campaign will be shown to you here.

Once you, as a campaign manager, have recommended an activity to the campaign participants to perform, or you, as an organizer, have invited campaign participants to participate in a joint campaign activity, the offered activity is displayed here. Click on "Add offer" to offer an activity to the campaign participants.
dcmhome.noMessages: Your messages to the campaign participants are displayed here. Click "Add message" to record a message to the campaign participants.
